# **28783722 | NicholasPRestifo | Nature | 2017 | Mel624 | EffectT**
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 28783722<br />
**Model**: Mel624 (human malignant melanoma cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: Effect T cell<br />
**Control**: Without T cell<br />
**Type**: Coculture-T<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in human malignant melanoma cell line Mel624 co-cultured with effect T cells. Negative values indicate genes whose knockout can enhance the efficacy of T-cell mediated tumor killing.<br />

## **Original Figures**
```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width='85%', fig.align='left', fig.cap=''}

```

# **29301958 | KaiWWucherpfennig | Science | 2018 | B16F10 | OT-I.OVA**
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 29301958<br />
**Model**: B16F10 (murine skin melanoma cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: After CRISPR screen, B16F10 cells were cocultured with OT-I T cells specific for ovalbumin (OVA) peptide.<br />
**Control**: OT-I T cells not specific for OVA peptide<br />
**Type**: Coculture-T<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in mouse skin cancer cells co-cultured with OT-I T cells specific for OVA peptide compared to non-OVA specific. Negative values indicate genes whose knockout can enhance the efficacy of OVA specific T-cell mediated tumor killing.<br />

## **Original Figures**
